item.description: At our July meeting many of you expressed interest in a networking luncheon. Well we are kicking off September with our first networking lunch. There will be no formal introductions and no presentation just an opportunity for members of our group to get together informally so that we can get to know one another even better. Come alone or bring a friend...all are welcome. Please note that the cut off for the RSVP is September 7th so that the venue has ample notice. Look forward to seeing you at our first lunch time event!

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE To Be Phenomenal Networking Lunch
